prompt: A modern farmhouse design with 4 bedrooms on a 1-acre plot near Mumbai, with large verandahs and indoor-outdoor flow.
scratchpad: This is a luxury/lifestyle project on a massive 1-acre plot. The architectural style is 'modern farmhouse,' which implies simple, gabled roof forms, a clean material palette (e.g., white plaster, wood accents), and a focus on rustic comfort. The key is 'indoor-outdoor flow' and 'large verandahs.' The house will be a single-story, sprawling structure. I'll design it as a series of connected pavilions or a 'U' shape to create a sheltered courtyard/patio space. The main living/dining/kitchen area will be a large, open-plan space with high ceilings and large sliding or folding glass doors that open directly onto the verandah and garden. The four bedrooms will be in a separate, private wing. Verandahs will wrap around the main living areas and connect different parts of the house. The large plot allows for ancillary structures like a garage, staff quarters, and extensive landscaping, but the JSON will focus on the main house.
